Articles.Content:
has anyone seen the problem or know of a fix for the speed control for the rover autopilot on MachJeb. When I turn it on the rover always keeps accelerating well beyond any speed I set. Does make following way point impossible as any turn leads to disaster. The one thing I have noticed it that when I set the speed to -2 it does slow the rover to a stop.. but not when I set it to -1.???

Any ideas?

I don't know about the rover speed, but in the dev build of the 6th of January, Sarbian did fix few NRE concerning the rover waypoint system. My guess is get the latest dev build and try it out. With a bit of luck... we never know.

Mechjeb latest dev
Make sure your navball shows it's pointed at the horizon.   I've had issues where it was pointed straight up, and in those cases the speed limit functionality didn't seem to work.
